name: INDIAN PHARMACEUTICAL ALLIANCE(FORMERLY INDIAN PHARMACEUTICAL ASSOCIATION)
description: DeRisk Affordable Medicine Supply Chain; seeking Partnership with US Government & Allies
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: IPA seeks a sectoral trade agreement with the US to derisk both countries' affordable medicine supply chain. The partnership construct is intended to be expanded to include other trusted allies.
